name: 1940 Elections
description: Quite possibly the strangest elections in Panama history - there are only two running parties. The CPN military party who advises centralizing the government under the hands of the military with the consent of the people, and the Constitutional Coalition, who advise a return to the status quo in Panamanian politics.

name: CPN Victory
description: The Coalición Patriótica Nacional, advising centralisation and a larger government, while protecting personal freedoms, has won the 1940 elections.

name: Start Modernisations
description: We shall begin our ambitious modernisation program.

name: Clear New Land
description: We should clear new land for factories and farming.

name: Industrial Projects
description: We should invest in businesses so they can build factories on our newly cleared land.

name: Status of the Land
description: We should choose whether to make the newly-cleared land in our nation state-owned or private-owned.

name: A Modern Panama
description: Panama is now a fully modernized nation. We have truly made Panama great.

name: Coalition Victory
description: The Constitutional Coalition, a broad coalition between most of the major non-military parties, has won the 1940 elections.

name: New National Police
description: We should compromise with the new military to create a new national police force. While we reduce its powers, we can surely find a compromise that benefits both us and the CPN/Army.

name: The Union Compromise
description: Some factions in our party want labor unions, some don't. We need to hammer out a compromise before it tears the coalition apart.

name: Export-based Economy
description: We need to encourage exports to other nations and continue our recent economic success.

name: Encourage Factional Cooperation
description: The factions within the coalition still see themselves as their respective parties. We need push the idea that we are not members of individual parties, but of a grand Coalition.

name: A Common Ideology
description: Our economy is booming, our compromises are successful, and we have created our own ideology based upon compromising between our various factions in different areas.
